titleStmt.title: Noctvrnall occvrrences, or, Deeds of darknesse committed by the cavaleers in their rendevous whereunto is conjoyned the severall postures used with their whores and pimpes : answering a booke, not long since printed, to which is annexed the exercise of souldiers beginning with these words, round heads stand to your armes.

Noctvrnall occvrrences, or, Deeds of darknesse committed by the cavaleers in their rendevous whereunto is conjoyned the severall postures used with their whores and pimpes : answering a booke, not long since printed, to which is annexed the exercise of souldiers beginning with these words, round heads stand to your armes.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
